summary: Tamara, an unattractive girl, who is picked on by her peers returns after her death as a sexy seductress to exact revenge.
cast: Jenna Dewan|Katie Stuart|Chad Faust|Bryan Clark|Melissa Marie Elias|Gil Hacohen|Marc Devigne|Matthew Marsden|Claudette Mink|Chris Sigurdson|Sarah Blondin|Magally Zelaya|Ernesto Griffith|Brian Davisson|Brandy Jaques|Jeffrey Reddick
title: Tamara
